urls.title: Our Fares
urls.description: The right flight. The right price. JetBlue offers flexible everyday low fares—most with no change or cancellation fees. Explore our airfare options.

data.text: @irmekclim Thank you for bringing this to our attention, as this is incorrect.  We'll have our IT team take a further look into this. All of our fare rules are listed correctly here: https://t.co/Oi2bRMzxTe

domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Automotive, Aircraft & Boat Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to automobile, spacecraft, aircraft and boat manufacturing

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Travel & Transportation Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

domain.description: Brands and Companies

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

domain.description: A taxonomy of user interests.

data.text: @irmekclim If there's no other fare class than Blue Basic, its because all other fare classes are sold out for the multi-city option. If you split your search into one-ways, you'll see more fare options.

urls.title: Contact Us
urls.description: Get help via chat, email or phone—we're here for you 24/7. Booking flights? To skip the $25 phone booking fee, book on jetblue.com or the JetBlue app.

data.text: @chauzer We understand your frustration, and have passed your feedback along to our IT team. Meanwhile, please reach out to our chat team to book your flights. https://t.co/f9MCxlsvPO

data.text: @REMBostonsports We're sorry that you're experiencing discomfort during your flight. Please see an inflight crewmember since they'll be your point of contact in this case. We hope you're able to get some rest during the remainder of the flight.

urls.title: Manage Trips
urls.description: Skip the (phone) line. It’s fast and easy to change, cancel and manage your JetBlue flights on jetblue.com. Select seats, add extras, check in and more.

data.text:
@ElaineWinship We're sorry to hear this, Elaine. We hope everyone in your family is safe. 
Most flights can be switched here: https://t.co/hoO0hBlrup

urls.title: Traveling with Pets
urls.description: Furbaby on board? Find out how to book your small dog or cat on your JetBlue flight, travel tips, a handy checklist, and even order an FAA-approved pet carrier.

data.text: @JPVT4U Hi there! Please visit us online for our pet guidelines and booking instructions. We'd love to welcome you on board! https://t.co/fhVOzVESRV
